Joel__02.1__The day of the Lord: : That is, the time when he will execute justice upon sinners.
Joel__02.2__A numerous and strong people: : The Assyrians, or Chaldeans. Others understand all this of an army of locusts laying waste the land.
Joel__02.20__The northern enemy: : Some understand this of Holofernes and his army: others, of the locusts.
